contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox album <!-- See Wikipedia:WikiProject_Albums --> | Name = Odyssey | Type = studio | Artist = [[Yngwie Malmsteen]] | Cover = YngwieJMalmsteen-Odyssey.jpg | Border = yes | Released = {{Start date|1988|4|8}}<ref>[http://www.metal-archives.com/albums/Yngwie_J._Malmsteen/Odyssey/314 "Yngwie J. Malmsteen - Odyssey"]. [[Encyclopaedia Metallum]]. 2011-11-23. Retrieved 2012-09-24.</ref> | Recorded = [[Cherokee Studios]] in [[Los Angeles|Los Angeles, California]]; House of Music Studios in [[West Orange, New Jersey]]; Studio D in [[Austin, Texas]] | Genre = [[Neo-classical metal]], [[heavy metal music|heavy metal]] | Length = {{Duration|m=50|s=42}} | Label = [[Polydor Records|Polydor]] | Producer = Yngwie Malmsteen, [[Jeff Glixman]], Jim Lewis | Last album = ''[[Trilogy (Yngwie Malmsteen album)|Trilogy]]''<br>(1986) | This album = '''''Odyssey'''''<br>(1988) | Next album = ''[[Trial by Fire (Yngwie Malmsteen album)|Trial by Fire: Live in Leningrad]]''<br>(1989) | Misc = {{Singles | Name = Odyssey | Type = studio | Single 1 = Heaven Tonight | Single 1 date = 1988 | Single 2 = Rising Force | Single 2 date = 1988 | Single 3 = Riot in the Dungeons | Single 3 date = 1988 }} }} {{Album ratings | rev1 = [[AllMusic]] | rev1score = {{Rating|2|5}}<ref name=allmusic>Huey, Steve. [http://www.allmusic.com/album/odyssey-mw0000651948 "Odyssey - Yngwie Malmsteen"]. ''[[AllMusic]]''. [[Rovi Corporation]]. Retrieved 2012-11-24.</ref> }} '''''Odyssey''''' is the fourth studio album by guitarist [[Yngwie Malmsteen]], released on April 8, 1988 through [[Polydor Records]]. It reached #40 on that year's [[Billboard 200|''Billboard'' 200]] chart and remained on that chart for 36 weeks.<ref name=billboard>[{{BillboardURLbyName|artist=yngwie j. malmsteen's rising force|chart=all}} "Odyssey - Yngwie J. Malmsteen's Rising Force"]. ''[[Billboard (magazine)|Billboard]]''. Retrieved 2012-11-24.</ref> As of 2012, ''Odyssey'' is Malmsteen's highest-charting ''Billboard'' 200 release. ==Track listing== {{Track listing | lyrics_credits = yes | music_credits = yes | title1 = Rising Force | lyrics1 = [[Joe Lynn Turner]] | music1 = Yngwie Malmsteen | length1 = 4:24 | title2 = Hold On | lyrics2 = Turner | music2 = Malmsteen | length2 = 5:12 | title3 = Heaven Tonight | lyrics3 = Turner | music3 = Malmsteen | length3 = 4:07 | title4 = Dreaming (Tell Me) | lyrics4 = Turner | music4 = Malmsteen | length4 = 5:22 | title5 = Bite the Bullet | lyrics5 = (instrumental) | music5 = Malmsteen | length5 = 1:35 | title6 = Riot in the Dungeons | lyrics6 = Turner | music6 = Malmsteen | length6 = 4:26 | title7 = Deja Vu | lyrics7 = Turner | music7 = Malmsteen | length7 = 4:17 | title8 = Crystal Ball | lyrics8 = Turner | music8 = Malmsteen | length8 = 4:56 | title9 = Now Is the Time | lyrics9 = Turner | music9 = Malmsteen | length9 = 4:34 | title10 = Faster than the Speed of Light | lyrics10 = Turner | music10 = Malmsteen | length10 = 4:30 | title11 = Krakatau | lyrics11 = (instrumental) | music11 = Malmsteen | length11 = 6:06 | title12 = Memories | lyrics12 = (instrumental) | music12 = Malmsteen | length12 = 1:14 | total_length = 50:42 }} ==Personnel== *[[Yngwie Malmsteen]] – [[guitar]], [[Moog Taurus]], [[bassline|bass]] (tracks 3–7, 10–12), [[record producer|production]] *[[Joe Lynn Turner]] – [[singing|vocals]] *[[Jens Johansson]] – [[keyboard instrument|keyboard]] *[[Anders Johansson]] – [[drum kit|drums]] *[[Bob Daisley]] – bass (tracks 1, 2, 8, 9) *[[Jeff Glixman]] – [[audio engineering|engineering]], production *Scott Gordon – engineering, [[audio mixing (recorded music)|mixing]] *John Rolio – engineering *[[Steve Thompson (musician)|Steve Thompson]] – mixing *[[Michael Barbiero]] – mixing *George Cowan – mixing *Jim Lewis – [[executive producer|executive production]] ==Chart performance== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Year !! Chart !!
